hero.name: Aurora Xu
hero.title: HR Innovator | Turning Data into People Insights
hero.description: Exploring how people and data can grow together — blending human insight, analytics, and innovation to shape the future of work.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I am Aurora Xu, a student of master degree in Human Resources and Business Analytics at UNSW. I am fascinated by how people, data, and strategy can come together to make work more meaningful. Along the way, I have supported recruitment and HRBP projects, which sparked my curiosity about the future of HR — how we can combine empathy and analytics to help both people and organizations grow. I am now exploring human capital consulting, where I hope to keep blending human insight with data thinking to create workplaces that are smarter, fairer, and more human.

timeline.title: HRBP & Recruiter (Intern)
timeline.description:
1. Collaborated HR operations through document management, analytics reporting, employee surveys, and creation of corporate communications materials.
2. Developed comprehensive onboarding and training materials, including presentation decks, employee handbooks, and feedback process that received management commendation.
3. Orchestrated cultural engagement initiatives including annual corporate events, traditional celebrations, and new employee orientations to strengthen organizational culture.
4. Conducted preliminary phone interviews and resume evaluations as part of initial candidate screening process, coordinated subsequent face-to-face assessments.

items.title: AI-driven Optimization of Airbnb Customer Satisfaction and Listing Valuation
items.description: Led a team to analyze Airbnb ratings and review texts, built SAS Viya models (Random Forest, Gradient Boost, Linear Regression) to explore relationships between pricing, customer experience, and operational resources, and proposed AI-driven strategies to enhance customer satisfaction and pricing efficiency.

items.title: Strategic Market Entry Plan for an Australian HR Consulting Firm in the US
items.description: Independently delivered a full consulting report evaluating US market entry feasibility, applied PESTLE, Porter’s Five Forces, and SWOT analyses, designed Go-to-Market strategy, team recruitment plan, and budget allocation for first-year operations.

items.title: Sales Data Analysis and Visualization Using Power BI
items.description: Cleaned and modeled retail sales data, built interactive Power BI dashboards to dynamically present sales trends, SKU composition, and channel performance, and provided recommendations for product line rationalization and regional channel optimization.

items.title: Traffic Accident Data Analysis for Insurance Risk Assessment
items.description: Processed and modeled traffic accident datasets, performed Python-based clustering and visualization, and designed risk classification and differential pricing recommendations for an insurance company.
items.achievement: Project submitted as report and presentation, earned Distinction, enhancing team expertise in risk modeling and data-driven insights.
